content: cozy up with our herringbone half double hat pattern crafted with just one ball of medium weight yarn 4 this top-down hat is a charming blend of cozy and pretty from baby to adult large it s available in multiple sizes and comes with a matching scarf pattern for a complete look photo tutorial for herringbone half double stitch https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/herringbone-half-double-crochet-stitch/ pattern includes photo tutorial to show you how to add a hat brim to a regular beanie a video tutorial is also available after the pattern is published on the blog two hat height options are included in each pattern size they are listed as base of earlobe slouch hat the base of earlobe row numbers will give you a hat that reaches to the base of the earlobe the slouch hat row will give you a longer slouch hat with a band you can turn up you can also make this as a regular beanie by working the pattern as written without adding the hat band > this
